item.title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET 24.2 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Diagram for .NET 24.2. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category DIAGRAMNET-53255 Shapes are not connected properly when there are several level of groups Enhancement DIAGRAMNET-53256 The lines have been unnecessarily broken and are out of frame Bug DIAGRAMNET-53259 Setting formulas in a group throws an exception Bug DIAGRAMNET-53260 Wrong cyrillic characters encoding when importing vsd to vsdx Bug DIAGRAMNET-53263 When converting vsdx to pdf a “Ghost-Link” appears in the red marked section Bug Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes The following is a list of any changes made to the public API such as added, renamed, removed or deprecated members as well as any non-backward compatible change made to Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Diagram for .NET 24.1. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category DIAGRAMNET-53248 Support .net6 Enhancement DIAGRAMNET-53239 Shape is flipped the wrong side after converting vsd to vsdx Bug DIAGRAMNET-53240 Masters hidden in vss are visible after converting to vssx Bug DIAGRAMNET-53242 LocPinY change is not handled properly Bug DIAGRAMNET-53243 Shape formula lost after grouping Bug DIAGRAMNET-53244 Shape heigth is not calculated properly Bug Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes The following is a list of any changes made to the public API such as added, renamed, removed or deprecated members as well as any non-backward compatible change made to Aspose.
